properties.areaDesc: Interior Hancock; Southern Piscataquis; Central Washington; Central Penobscot; Southern Penobscot; Northern Washington
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 2:32AM EST until January 26 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
up to one inch, sleet accumulations around a quarter of an
inch, and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch
expected.

* WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, Interior
DownEast and Penobscot Valley Maine.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or
freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery
roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to
newengland511.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
